text: Hey Cuchulahn, Ive just watched it through and I have some feedback :slightly_smiling_face:
so first of all, I wouldnt put any layout pieces into your real at all, so for example that lipsync one you have with the guys typing should be finished and polished if you want to keep it in there.

Also keep an eye out for body mechanics. When the rabbit is cocking the gun his hand movement isn't synced up with the movement of the gun, although he does have a lovely facial expression. Also in your punching shot  there are some body mechanic issues. The arm facing the camera has some funky things going on with the wrist and you want to make sure the hands are always moving in an arc, not in straight lines. Also add some aggression to that rabbits face, he seems a bit sleepy even though he is punching someone. The last piece is really nice, I would actually put it at the start of your reel as its the strongest! Keep going! i'm quickly gonna check when the applications have to be handed in by
submission deadlin eis the 8th of may so you have anice 2 months to work on your reel
I would definitely work on that lipsync piece though as you have to have one in your reel if you want the animation internship
